Articles.Content:
So does anyone know how on iPad, iPhone, and many other devices there is this bar at the top of of your keyboard which has these word guesses of what you say? So I’m going to do something weird and I’m gonna just hit the middle button an see what happens:

 

 to the next day I cannot is a good time for me a little later today or later I cannot was the time I was gonna we were having dinner at your place in a few days and then you got me to eat dinner I love love to see your face I love love to see your face I wannabe like that you are the one I cannot you know you love love to love love and love love to see your beautiful love and love love you love loves and I cannot was a really cool and fun day and you have a great day I cannot is a good time for me I gotta is a good one for me and then you can go get your parents house or something to do it then I wanna is your day and then I can do stuff for dinner I don’t think you can eat dinner or do not eat it then I can go eat and eat some dinner then you I don’t think you can do that I don’t think you can eat.

 

You see, usually the word generator just gets clogged up and it ends up repeating words a lot, like I noticed it said “love” and all of that related stuff WAY to much for my comfort, although it is a fun thing like a fake email prank generator.
Well, part of the predictor is based on what you’ve typed before. So I’m to guess that there is someone you love whom you have (or ask out to) dinner with a lot

To be clear, I have never use the predictive text feature anywhere.

But AFAIK there are bots that are made to try "replicate" (?) you.

I downloaded a keyboard app for my phone, so my predictions are little different. I don't think I've ever seen mine repeat a word.

Also, obligatory xkcd:

The first thing is to get to your life support for a new one day or even better to do look like it would also be nice if it was a good idea of having to go back down a few times when I tried making it easier for you all of my stuff and it turns off on it when people do not speak african or something else to say I don't have any connection problem to use when it does work when it comes out when it does it all is very cool to see how many times it is actually possible for me that to use a little bit more than I can do think it does not have a space

On 6/23/2018 at 9:53 AM, StrandedonEarth said:

Well, part of the predictor is based on what you’ve typed before. So I’m to guess that there is someone you love whom you have (or ask out to) dinner with a lot

Ironically, I don’t actually type that word very much, apart from at the end of emails to my family like when you say stuff like love you or miss you or see you later and all of that sort of stuff.

 

 I am going to call you and you can call me later bye bye love you bye bye love love you bye bye hello hello love you bye bye love you bye love love you bye bye love you bye love love you bye bye love you bye love love you bye bye love you bye love love you bye bye love you bye love love you bye bye love you bye love love you bye bye love you bye love love you bye 

My keyboard prediction system is malfunctioning and now all it says is “bye” and “love you”. If I did have someone I liked they would have already gone crazy because I cant refrain from talking about rocketry at the table and because I spend way to much time faffing around on the KSP forums and in KSP itself.

My turn!
